name: orderfox-root
description: Root package for OrderFox application - PHP Backend + Vanilla JS Frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend_php && php -S localhost:8000 -t public" "cd backend_php && php websocket_server.php" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "cd backend_php && php -S localhost:8000 -t public" "cd backend_php && php websocket_server.php"
scripts.dev:container: concurrently "cd backend_php && php -S 0.0.0.0:8000 -t public" "cd backend_php && php websocket_server.php" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd backend_php && composer install && cd ../frontend && npm install
